title: Is it Leonardo or Jesus?
post:
These Shroud theories continue to circulate don’t they?  It’s like hoaxes that go around on email: nobody checks it out, they just forward the hoax to everyone they know and as a result, everybody believes the Lie rather than digging to find out the truth for themselves. (Basically: you should NEVER believe ONE WORD you get on Email.)  I always check things out on Snopes.com  or… there’s another site like that but I can never remember it’s name. 
I wonder what Snopes has to say about the Shroud.
author: AnnieCee

title: Is it Leonardo or Jesus?
post:
The other site is URBAN LEGENDS at about.com, or:
http://urbanlegends.about.com/
Neither one of those sites had anything about the Shroud of Turin. But they’re a good reference if you care to check out the crazy emails you get.
author: AnnieCee
